articles.description: With WWDC just weeks away, the wait to see the true potential of iOS 18 and its impact on your iPhone won't be long.
articles.content: With Apple's annual Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) just around the corner, kicking off on June 10th, there are rumours about interesting features coming to the iPhone with the iOS 18 launch.… [+1771 chars]

articles.title: Google adds AI-powered features to Chromebook - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google said today it's adding new AI-powered features such as a writing assistant and a wallpaper creator and providing easy access to Gemini chatbot to its Chromebook Plus line of devices.
articles.content: Google announced new AI-powered features today for its Chromebook Plus line of devices, such as a writing assistant, a wallpaper creator and an easy access to Google’s Gemini chatbot. As a reminder, … [+3522 chars]

articles.title: MLA's Son Involved In Pune Porsche Crash, Legislator Spoke To Cops: Congress - NDTV
articles.description: Turning up the political heat over the Pune accident, in which a 17-year-old rammed his Porsche into a bike, killing two techies in their 20s, the Congress has alleged that the son of an MLA was also involved in the accident.
articles.content:
Two doctors from a Pune hospital have been arrested for allegedly replacing the teenager's blood samples.
